newsitem.title: GERMANY: Bremen coffee prices up, buyers await reductions.
newsitem.headline: Bremen coffee prices up, buyers await reductions.

text.p: Price rises in Bremen arabicas by $3-7 on the week per 50 kg fob reflected an earlier run-up in futures, although New York on Friday had not recovered from a mid-week sell-off.
Dealings were thin as consumers were hoping for price reductions once markets move out of the Brazil winter period.
Sept/Oct shipment Brazils traded as well as Colombians and Central Americans for nearby and more distant dates.
Kenyan prices rose to prohibitive levels due to strong demand.
Robustas were steady, with Ivorian G-2 at $78 cif.
